function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Relying on sensor-only estimation of people flow","Impact":"Inaccurate estimation of people occupancy, leading to potential overcrowding in certain areas and increased risk of contagious disease transmission.","Mitigation":"Integration of multiple data sources and estimation methods to improve accuracy of people flow estimation.","Technologies":"Sensor fusion, machine learning algorithms for occupancy estimation.","People":"Building occupants, facility managers, public health officials.","Owner":"Building management, data analysts, public health authorities."},{"Description":"Dependence on estimation methods for building occupancy","Impact":"Reliance on estimation methods may lead to false sense of security and inadequate preparedness for contagious disease transmission control.","Mitigation":"Validation of estimation methods through comparison with ground truth data, continuous monitoring and calibration of estimation models.","Technologies":"Kalman filter, Anylogic simulation, real-time occupancy monitoring systems.","People":"Building occupants, public health officials, emergency responders.","Owner":"Data analysts, building management, public health authorities."},{"Description":"Limited applicability of the proposed method to large-scale buildings","Impact":"Inability to accurately estimate people occupancy in high-rise buildings may result in inadequate emergency preparedness and response to contagious disease outbreaks.","Mitigation":"Research and development of scaling techniques for the proposed method, integration of building design features that facilitate people flow monitoring and occupancy estimation.","Technologies":"Advanced simulation software, scalable occupancy estimation algorithms.","People":"Building designers, emergency responders, public health officials.","Owner":"Research institutions, building management, public health authorities."}]}
